function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Environmental degradation and safety concerns from natural disasters like flooding and extreme heat waves.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emphasis on smart sensors and devices leads to privacy concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on advanced technologies introduces vulnerability to cyber attacks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to smart city technologies exacerbates urban safety disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to smart city infrastructure and iot devices, leading to potential intrusion and exploitation of personal data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of iot devices and systems due to heterogeneity of protocols, leading to potential interference and security breaches.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring the security and safety of cities due to the combined adoption of safe city and smart city concepts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased conflicts and crimes due to disparities and deprivations in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safety and resilience in cities affecting sustainable development","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unauthorized access to surveillance data due to coupling of video surveillance and cloud storage","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns arising from the use of surveillance and data extraction technologies in urban developments.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of data breaches and system infiltration in safe city concepts, leading to compromised security of urban systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in managing the safe city concept due to lack of uniformity in protocols and centralized networks, leading to increased complexity and cost.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about private data collection and monitoring in urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading information and propaganda in the context of safe city projects","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privatization of data collection and delegation to third parties","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and security in the collection and analysis of sensitive and personal data through iot and big data technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interconnected smart systems and devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of standards for secure iot device integration and data exchange","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control over data collected by private entities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of universal standards for data management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public mistrust of private sector involvement in data management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data privacy and security measures in smart city infrastructure could lead to unauthorized access to sensitive medical information.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between ppps and the actual needs of the cities may lead to ineffective implementation of smart city and safe city projects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited funding capacity of cities may lead to reliance on ppps, which could introduce challenges in ensuring equity, affordability, and accessibility of smart city and safe city services for all residents.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy, control, and propaganda issues arising from the implementation of smart and safe city concepts.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Security loopholes and threats posed by smart grid, automated building systems, unmanned aerial vehicles, and iot-enabled sensors.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of data leading to espionage and financial exploitation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical damage to installed devices and systems due to data access","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear and discomfort among citizens due to surveillance and data privacy concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneity of systems impacting trust in smart city concept","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consent for personal data processing in smart city systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of policies, standards, and governance for data usage in smart city concepts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance from the general public towards the coupling of smart city and safe city concepts.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty around data usage in the context of public private partnerships ppp for smart and safe city implementation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential reliance on proprietary technology as an alternative to addressing privacy and security concerns in smart and safe cities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Threat to public health and economy due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased monitoring and management of human activities by corporate capitalism","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transformation of cities through digital technology innovation changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased dependence on digital platforms due to covid-19, leading to social and cultural reformation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of smart city technology and 6g may lead to increased surveillance and privacy services","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies and communication infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor coverage in 1g technology","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low sound quality in 1g technology","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of roaming support capacity in
